title: Reversible metal-organic polymers template enhances platinum nanoparticles self-assemblies and accelerates POD-like catalysis for rapid and ultrasensitive multiple forms mercury detection
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00779D, Paper
fan zhang, Tianyu Guo, Liwen Feng, Yaobin Lu, Jiewei Deng, Tiangang Luan
Monitoring the distribution characteristics of various forms of mercury is crucial for understanding its biogeochemical cycling and assessing health risks. The accurate detection of inorganic and organic mercury still relies...
